mdRecord.dcterms:title: Confederate Monument Dedication Ceremony, July 4, 1904, Captain W.T. Sowers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Confederate Monument Dedication Ceremony, July 4, 1904, the people in the photograph are as follows: Sowers, Captain William T. (Bill) Pendleton, Birdie Mrs (holding small flag) Howard, Jennie(fourth from right front row) Peterman, Alice (Birdie's flag obscures part of her face)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Monuments
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
